posts.content:

OG cargo rubber mat - SOLD

OG patina ivory steering wheel with OG Deluxe hornpush (worn), wheel is solid wont fall apart (needs metal locator on back) and horn works - £110 for both + pp







3 x OG Headlight switches, all presumed working but untested, with OG ivory knobs - £40 each (different ages)

Dog-shroud fan housing with both flap assemblies. Front is nice and acid etched/primed/painted (the bit you see), black is quickly blown over. No rust, good condition £35+pp



Will add plenty more bits i.e. long and short spoons spoons, OG paint Sigla pop-outs, early door cards, pockets etc etc and pics shortly, tons oe parts, engine bits etc clearing out....

Probably putting my bus up shortly (see Avatar pic, OG '60/61 mango) - £25k
